page.title: 02RECREATION
page.content: In Great Leighs there is a village hall where many activities are held each day of the week.On Monday there is brownies,Tuesday there is ballet,Wednesday there is slimming classes and on Friday there is carpet bowls.Sometimes on Saturday there is country and western dancing.There is a playing field with swings,a see-saw and a sand pit.Great Leighs has a cricket club and football club both of which play on the playing field.There is a stage in the village hall and sometimes the ballet classes hold a show on the stage.There is also a free church on the main road.Every Tuesday morning a coffee morning is held,and every month there is a bring and buy sale.The village hall also holds rummage sales and sometimes a disco.
